attributes.action: everyone to accept the decision of the majority of voters of the eu referendum
attributes.additional_details:
We ask that another referendum is not done for the following reasons
1)We have had weeks of debates and we cant take anymore
2)We can not afford to use anymore of tax payers money to fund it.
3)Most importantly we ask that you all accept the decision and help our country move forward,the europian union has already said they want to move forward and so we should our country is called the United Kingdom,and Great Britain for a reason as can be United and Great.
attributes.background: On thursday the uk went to the pollscto decide of we want to be part of the Eu.The people voted and 52% people wanted to leave with overall lead of over 1.2 million people. We understand that not everyone welcomed the result but the decision was made.
